remarks: Inter alia, may consider annual renewal of issuance of Long-Term Bonds (Financing of Infrastructure & Affordable Housing), Perpetual Debt Instruments (part of Additional Tier I & Tier II capital bonds
Inter alia, proposes to raise funds by issuing Perpetual Debt Instruments (part of Additional Tier I capital), Tier II Capital Bonds and Long-Term Bonds up to total amount of Rs. 50,000 crores.
